news.title: JPMorgan Chase Debuts JPMD, a Digital Deposit Token
news.body: JPMorgan Chase is launching a 'deposit token' called JPMD, designed to digitally represent commercial bank money for institutional clients. This move, as reported by CNBC and PYMNTS.com, positions JPMD as a robust alternative to stablecoins, tightly integrated with traditional banking systems. It's set to reshape digital currency use in institutional banking, offering a secure and regulated option.

news.title: GENIUS Act Moves Forward, Setting Stage for US Crypto Regulation
news.body: The U.S. Senate's approval of the GENIUS Act marks a pivotal step towards establishing a regulated framework for cryptocurrencies in the U.S. This legislation, highlighted by PYMNTS.com, aligns with efforts to foster a stable and innovative cryptocurrency environment, potentially transforming the regulatory landscape for digital assets.

news.title: Thailand Grants 5-Year Tax Holiday for Crypto Investors
news.body: Thailand's Cabinet has endorsed a five-year tax exemption on capital gains from cryptocurrency trading on licensed platforms. Reported by Fintech Singapore, this policy could significantly stimulate the digital economy and attract more investors to Thailand's cryptocurrency market, enhancing the country's position as a digital asset hub in Asia.

news.title: Visa Launches Flex Credential in Vietnam for Enhanced Payment Flexibility
news.body: Visa has introduced the Flex Credential in Vietnam, allowing users to toggle between payment types using a single card. This innovation, first adopted by Asia Commercial Joint Stock Bank and reported by Fintech Singapore, promises to revolutionize payment convenience in Southeast Asia, catering to a diverse consumer base.

news.title: OSTTRA, Baton, and Partior Pioneer 24/7 FX Settlement with Tokenized Funds
news.body: OSTTRA, Baton Systems, and Partior are revolutionizing the FX market by enabling 24/7 settlement using tokenized bank funds. This development, as reported by Fintech Singapore, allows financial institutions to conduct trades anytime with enhanced efficiency, potentially reshaping global foreign exchange operations.
